pkgmetadata.longdescription: STK++ Integration to R using Rcpp // STK++ (http://www.stkpp.org) is a collection of C++ classes for statistics, clustering, linear algebra, arrays (with an Eigen-like API), regression, dimension reduction, etc. The integration of the library to R is using Rcpp. . The rtkpp package includes the header files from the STK++ library (currently version 0.8.99). Thus users do not need to install STK++ itself in order to use it. . STK++ is licensed under the GNU LGPL version 2 or later. rtkpp (the stkpp integration into R) is licensed under the GNU GPL version 2 or later.
